text: Tenitra Michelle Williams (born July 23, 1979) is an American gospel and R&B; singer, songwriter, and actress. She was a background singer for Monica, before rising to fame as part of the successful Grammy Award-winning musical group Destiny's Child, the world's best-selling female group of all time, selling over 100 million records worldwide. Williams played the character Shug Avery in the play The Color Purple. She was a contestant in the 2010 series of British reality television show Strictly Come Dancing. In 2013, she made a return to inspirational music with the lead single, If We Had Your Eyes from her upcoming fourth studio album titled Journey to Freedom. title: Michelle Williams (singer)
